Disney Girl Meets World USA (complete title)
el Mundo de Riley World-wide (Spanish title)
akas from release info: Ένα Κορίτσι Γνωρίζει τον Κόσμο Greece
Her er ditt liv, Riley Norway
Disney Girl Meets World USA (complete title)
el Mundo de Riley World-wide (Spanish title)

1.title: Girl Meets High School: Part 1
1.plot: Riley, Maya, Lucas, Farkle, Zay, and Smackle start their freshmen year and quickly learn their place as smaller fish in a much bigger lake.

2.title: Girl Meets High School: Part 2
2.plot: The gang continues to navigate the rigors of high school; some join sports teams while others choose academic clubs.

3.title: Girl Meets Jexica
3.plot: Riley creates an online alter-ego, Jexica, when she doesn't feel confident that her new high school classmates will like the real her. Cory and Topanga struggle with Auggie's internet usage.

4.title: Girl Meets Permanent Record
4.plot: After receiving a bad grade, Riley realizes high school scores count toward her permanent record.

5.title: Girl Meets Triangle
5.plot: Maya's identity crisis kicks into full gear when her art teacher makes her realize that her friendship with Riley may be effecting her artist's voice.

6.title: Girl Meets Upstate
6.plot: Riley and Maya go to Shawn's house to get the real Maya back. Meanwhile, Lucas decides who he loves the most. Riley and Maya don't tell Cory and Topanga where they have gone.

7.title: Girl Meets True Maya
7.plot: Maya leaves Riley and their friendship aside for a while and tries to figure out who the real Maya inside her is.

8.title: Girl Meets Ski Lodge: Part 1
8.plot: When Cory becomes the head of the Nature Club, the whole gang heads out on a trip to a familiar ski lodge.

9.title: Girl Meets Ski Lodge: Part 2
9.plot: With the group's ski trip coming to an end, it is apparent that Lucas must finally choose between Riley and Maya.

10.title: Girl Meets I Do
10.plot: Katy and Shawn prepare their vows, for their wedding. With Topanga as maid of honor and Cory as best man.

11.title: Girl Meets the Real World
11.plot: Riley has trouble with her debate assignment when she must argue if people are naturally good or evil.

12.title: Girl Meets Bear
12.plot: Riley wakes to find her childhood teddy bear, Barry the Bear, missing and enlists the help of her family and friends to find him.

13.title: Girl Meets the Great Lady of New York
13.plot: Everyone's getting in touch with their roots as they go through cultural week by exploring their heritage, whether they be Irish or Texan.

14.title: Girl Meets She Don't Like Me
14.plot: Riley tries to make new friends at high school, but she finds it hard and not everyone is acting friendly.

15.title: Girl Meets World: Of Terror 3
15.plot: Auggie tells the reimagined future of their lives if Riley and Maya never met.

16.title: Girl Meets Her Monster
16.plot: Riley skips out on helping Topanga at the bakery to stay home and binge-watch her favorite TV show and Topanga is not pleased.

17.title: Girl Meets Hollyworld
17.plot: Maya schemes to sabotage another actress so that her mom will get a role in an upcoming movie.

18.title: Girl Meets a Christmas Maya
18.plot: It's Christmas time and Riley is excited to celebrate her favorite holiday, but for Maya the holidays only bring back unhappy memories from her childhood.

19.title: World Meets Girl
19.plot: Fans peek behind the scenes of "Girl Meets World".

20.title: Girl Meets Sweet Sixteen
20.plot: With Riley's 16th birthday approaching, the kids contemplate the future and how rapidly their relationships will change in a few short years.

21.title: Girl Meets Goodbye
21.plot: Topanga is offered promotion at work to run her law firm's London office. While Topanga tries to make the right decision for The Matthews family, Riley and her friend struggle with what may happen if Riley moves to London.

1.title: Girl Meets World
1.plot: When Maya leads a rebellion in class, Riley joins in to try to be like her - much to her father, Cory's, dismay.

2.title: Girl Meets Boy
2.plot: Cory's homework assignment inadvertently brings Riley and Lucas closer together.

3.title: Girl Meets Sneak Attack
3.plot: An exchange between Missy and Lucas has Riley seeing green; Maya and Farkle teach Riley how to flirt.

4.title: Girl Meets Father
4.plot: Corey has trouble accepting the fact that Riley is growing up. Maya copes with receiving an 'F' on her paper.

5.title: Girl Meets the Truth
5.plot: After Cory teaches a lesson on truth, Riley and Maya struggle with whether or not it was right to lie to Farkle and tell him he's a good actor and if Maya should keep the locket she found, even though it doesn't belong to her.

6.title: Girl Meets Popular
6.plot: Riley becomes the queen of the nerdy group and enjoys it until she learns to be herself. Meanwhile, Topanga is conflicted about her law firm working to shut down a local mom and pop bakery.

7.title: Girl Meets Maya's Mother
7.plot: It's Career Day. Farkle invites his dad, Stuart Minkus. Maya's mom doesn't come so Riley helps Maya get over it.

8.title: Girl Meets Smackle
8.plot: Riley and Maya give schoolmate Smackle a makeover to attract Farkle. Meanwhile, Farkle recruits Lucas to his debate team in an attempt to distract arch nemesis Smackle, and Auggie is in despair over a break-up with his "girlfriend" Ava.

9.title: Girl Meets 1961
9.plot: Cory sets the class an assignment to find out about their ancestors, and the kids learn not to repeat the mistakes of the past.

10.title: Girl Meets Crazy Hat
10.plot: Cory divides his class into two fake companies for a lesson, one driven by profits and the other by making people happy, which brings out a terrible side of Farkle's personality. Meanwhile, Riley and Maya encounter a woman in the subway who is quite different than they first perceive her to be.

11.title: Girl Meets World: Of Terror
11.plot: The kids face a trilogy of terror when Riley has a sleepover at Maya's with her Gammy Hart and pet ferret. Auggie confronts the monster under his bed, and Farkle tackles his most terrifying fear yet - playing softball.

12.title: Girl Meets the Forgotten
12.plot: After the gang spills food in the school cafeteria, Riley and Maya are forced to work there, while Lucas and Farkle are assigned janitorial duty with school janitor Harley Keiner, Cory's old bully.

13.title: Girl Meets Flaws
13.plot: Farkle skips class after another student tells him he is weird. Riley, Maya, and Lucas then go around trying to figure out who said that and why.

14.title: Girl Meets Friendship
14.plot: When Cory teaches his class about various forms of government, Riley, Lucas and Farkle decide to run against each other for 7th-grade class president.

15.title: Girl Meets Brother
15.plot: Cory and Topanga teach Riley the importance of responsibility, leaving her home to look after her little brother while they go out to celebrate their anniversary.

16.title: Girl Meets Home for the Holidays
16.plot: The Matthews family and Shawn visit for Christmas. Topanga tries to impress Amy with her cooking while Riley tries to work on her relationship with Shawn.

17.title: Girl Meets Game Night
17.plot: Corey has a hard time accepting the fact that Riley invited her friends to Family Game Night. The kids compare Corey's attitude to his lesson, earlier that day, on the Revolutionary War.

18.title: Girl Meets Master Plan
18.plot: For Maya's birthday, Riley and Cory try to set Shawn up with Maya's mother.

19.title: Girl Meets Farkle's Choice
19.plot: Farkle has to choose between Riley and Maya as dates to an awards ceremony that he attends annually. Meanwhile, Topanga, Cory, and Auggie have a book club with Auggie's girlfriend, Ava.

20.title: Girl Meets First Date
20.plot: Lucas asks for Cory's permission to go on a date with Riley, to which he agrees as long as Maya and Farkle go with them.

21.title: Girl Meets Demolition
21.plot: Riley and Maya meet Aubrey, salesgirl who manipulates them into using Topanga's credit card for an expensive purchase.

1.title: Girl Meets Gravity
1.plot: Riley and Maya are anxious to begin eighth grade and have a new teacher who isn't Riley's father. Meanwhile, Mrs. Svorski asks Topanga to take over the bakery.

2.title: Girl Meets the New World
2.plot: The students of John Quincy Adams Middle School are curious to know of status of Riley and Lucas's relationship, which ultimately confuses the two of them more than ever before.

3.title: Girl Meets the Secret of Life
3.plot: A new student from Texas turns out to be an old friend of Lucas's, but the Lucas of the past isn't the Lucas whom the gang knows.

4.title: Girl Meets Pluto
4.plot: Cory takes Topanga, Shawn, Riley and Maya to Philadelphia to dig up a time capsule that they buried 15 years earlier.

5.title: Girl Meets Mr. Squirrels
5.plot: When Riley and Maya get into a fight, Cory enlists the help of his older brother, Eric, to be a mediator.

6.title: Girl Meets the Tell-Tale-Tot
6.plot: Riley tells a lie so she and Maya can attend a party and must deal with the guilt of sneaking around her parents.

7.title: Girl Meets Rules
7.plot: When the entire class gets detention, the class divides and chaos ensues. Meanwhile, Auggie's friend Ava attempts to be nicer when she thinks she's losing him to another girl.

8.title: Girl Meets Hurricane
8.plot: Cory and Shawn take the girls out for a fun night, but just as Maya feels closer to Shawn, someone from his past comes back into his life and risks ruining everything.

9.title: Girl Meets Mr. Squirrels Goes to Washington
9.plot: Uncle Eric is recruited to run for the Senate, but learns it was only because they expected him to lose. Riley and her friends rally together to help his campaign.

10.title: Girl Meets the New Teacher
10.plot: A new teacher is hired and uses non-traditional ways of learning to engage the students, and the principal does not agree. Cory defends the teacher, which ultimately gets him in trouble too.

11.title: Girl Meets Fish
11.plot: When the class fish dies, Riley and her friends are the main suspects. Owl Detective Auggie Matthews takes on the case.

12.title: Girl Meets Yearbook
12.plot: The kids aren't satisfied with what they've been voted "Most Likely" for in the school yearbook, and take matters into their own hands to change it.

13.title: Girl Meets Semi-Formal
13.plot: Riley is asked to the semi-formal dance by a classmate named Charlie and is torn whether to go with him or Lucas. Meanwhile, Cory's brother Eric is paid a visit from an old friend, Jack Hunter.

14.title: Girl Meets Creativity
14.plot: When art and music are threatened to be cut from school, the kids have to find a creative way to convince the school board to show their value.

15.title: Girl Meets Farkle
15.plot: Riley, Maya and Lucas emphasize the beauty of being unique as they rally around their friend Farkle Minkus, who may be on the autism spectrum. Meanwhile, his friendship with another student, Smackle, grows fonder.

16.title: Girl Meets Cory and Topanga
16.plot: When Riley comes to the realization that her parents, Cory and Topanga, are making a positive impact in the world, she questions the impact she's making to the world.

17.title: Girl Meets Rileytown
17.plot: After Maya hurts Riley's feelings, the group learns that Riley is overly sensitive because another classmate is making fun of her. Riley's friends encourage her to like herself for who she is.

18.title: Girl Meets World: Of Terror 2
18.plot: Riley and Maya run into a somewhat old friend when they meet the ghost of the bay window-who just happens to be a flapper from the 1920s.

19.title: Girl Meets Rah Rah
19.plot: As the annual cheerleading tryouts come around again, Riley is determined to finally make the squad.

20.title: Girl Meets Texas: Part 1
20.plot: Riley, Maya, and Farkle head to Texas with Lucas, who has been entered in the bull-riding competition at the rodeo in his hometown.

21.title: Girl Meets Texas: Part 2
21.plot: Riley, Maya, and Lucas try to figure out their feelings while they are in Texas together.

22.title: Girl Meets Texas: Part 3
22.plot: Riley, Maya, and Lucas deal with the aftermath of what happened in Texas.

23.title: Girl Meets the Forgiveness Project
23.plot: Mr. Matthews decides to do something different, so he gives the class the forgiveness project. Everyone else finds it easier to forgive somebody except Maya - she has to choose if she should forgive her absent dad or fail.

24.title: Girl Meets Belief
24.plot: Cory asks the kids to challenge one another's beliefs to see if it changes their perspectives.

25.title: Girl Meets the New Year
25.plot: Farkle tells Riley that she has until midnight on New Year's Eve to tell everyone how she really feels about Lucas.

26.title: Girl Meets STEM
26.plot: Riley is upset when the boys at school won't let her participate in a science experiment and attempts to become more involved.

27.title: Girl Meets Money
27.plot: When Farkle's dad makes a bad investment, Farkle becomes worried about what that might mean for his family.

28.title: Girl Meets Commonism
28.plot: Maya and Farkle are caught cheating on a test and have to face the school honor board. Meanwhile, Auggie tries to figure out what he wants to be when he grows up.

29.title: Girl Meets the Bay Window
29.plot: Riley decides to redecorate the bay window; Maya is offended and hurt that Riley would violate their sacred space.

30.title: Girl Meets Legacy
30.plot: With middle school graduation around the corner, Riley, Maya, Lucas and Farkle work together to determine what kind of legacy they want to leave at John Quincy Adams.

imdb.plot outline: Riley is the daughter of Cory and Topanga and she goes to school with her friends Maya and Farkle and new person Lucas who Riley likes. Cory is Riley's history teacher and everything Riley and Maya do has something to do with their school life problems.
imdb.title: Girl Meets World
plot: More than a decade after _Boy Meets World (1993)_ (qv), Cory and Topanga Matthews are married and have two children. Their daughter, Riley, faces life lessons through her family, friends, and school--where her father is her history teacher--as her parents did when they were younger.::Chris Green

Riley is the daughter of Cory and Topanga and she goes to school with her friends Maya and Farkle and new person Lucas who Riley likes. Cory is Riley's history teacher and everything Riley and Maya do has something to do with their school life problems.

_Girl Meets World_ (qv) is the Boy Meets World for a whole new generation. Riley is the pre-teen daughter of Corey and Topanga from the original TGIF series. Riley and her best friend Maya navigate the highs and lows of middle school while little brother Auggie cheers them on. Maya is the carefree and daring part of the friendship while Riley is quick-thinking and responsible. When the irresistibly attractive Lucas Friar moves to town from Texas things get really shaken up and Riley decides it's time to take on the world.::LadyPhantastic

Fourteen years after Boy Meets World, Cory and Topanga are the parents of a perky 12-year-old girl named Riley and an adorable 5-year-old son named Auggie. Along with her two best friends, Maya and Farkle, her crush, Lucas, and her history teacher (her father) Riley learns the ups and downs of being a pre-teen and life.

More than a decade after Boy Meets World, Riley Mathews, daughter of Cory and Topanga Mathews, and her friends face challenges similar to what Cory and Topanga faced. Every day her father who is also her history teacher gives her a lesson that is actually a life lesson.
